avalancheActivity.highlights: Windslabs have formed after prevailing NE-NW winds and snowdrift. Older windslabs may still exist in easterly aspects. Possibility of considerable snow in mountains in the next days and the snow may be unstable to begin with.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Some snow has accumulated during SW-snow showers since the 14th. On the 23rd and 24th there was increased NE and NW wind with snowdrift in mountains. Windslabs have formed in southerly aspects especially in lows and gullies. Older windslabs may still exist in easterly aspects. No snow profiles have been done in the area to check the stability of the snowpack. Considerable snow forecasted in mountains in the next few days and the snow may be unstable to begin with.

travelAdvisory.comment:
Avalanche risk has decreased in the North and northern Westfjords after the uncertanty stage was lifted. People should take care when traveling in steep terrain as considerable snow has been added and/or transported in the mountains and snowlayers can be unstable. 
Snow will be added in mountains in most parts of the country the next few days and snow can be unstable to begin with and/or be poorly bonded with older snow.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Winter conditions in all of the country. Snow can be unstable.

weatherForecast.highlights: Útlit fyrir fremur hægum austlægum eða breytilegum áttum og snjókomu næstu daga. Frost 0 til 8 stig.

avalancheActivity.comment: Many avalanches have fallen in the area during the weekend, such as in Skutulfjörður, Flateyri, Súðavíkurhlíð and Súgandafjörður.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Windslabs in south facing aspects after N and NE snowstorm that can be unstable. Persistent weakness may be widespread.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Much loose snow has been added the last days, especially late 23.12. and early 24.12. Before there was little snow. New windslabs are expected to have formed mainly in southern aspects. A snow profile was done in Seljalandsdalur on the 25th of December at 330 m.asl. The profile shows a weak layer at 63 cm depth with faceted crystals, that are rounding, between an older softer layer and a layer of layered ice lenses. On top there are layered windslabs. Compression test gave a sudden planar break under medium stress (CT13, CT12 @63 SP) at the upper layerboundary of the faceted layer. This weakness may be widespread.

travelAdvisory.comment:
Avalanche risk has decreased in the North and northern Westfjords after the uncertanty stage was lifted. People should take care when traveling in steep terrain as considerable snow has been added and/or transported in the mountains and snowlayers can be unstable. 
Snow will be added in mountains in most parts of the country the next few days and snow can be unstable to begin with and/or be poorly bonded with older snow.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Winter conditions in all of the country. Snow can be unstable.

weatherForecast.highlights: Útlit fyrir fremur hæg breytilega átt og lítilsháttar snjókomu. Bætir svo í  NA átt á miðvikudagskvöld.  Frost 3 til 15 stig.

avalancheActivity.comment: Multiple avalanches released around Ólafsfjörður and above Ólafsfjarðarvegur on the 24th and 25th. An avalanche released in Strengsgil the night before 24.12. and ran over the road Fjarðarvegur. Two avalanches ran over Siglufjarðarvegur late 23.12.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Significant amount of snow has been added in mountains and the snowpack can be unstable in most aspects. People traveling on steep terrain should be careful and choose conservative routes.

snowpackStructure.highlights: A lot of new snow is in the area and wind slabs have formed in various aspects. Snow subsided a bit on Sunday when it warmed up slightly. Weaknesses are expected in the snowpack and that increases the risk of human triggered avalanches. Considerable snowfall in light winds is expected on Wednesday, and the new snow can be unstable at first.

travelAdvisory.comment:
Avalanche risk has decreased in the North and northern Westfjords after the uncertanty stage was lifted. People should take care when traveling in steep terrain as considerable snow has been added and/or transported in the mountains and snowlayers can be unstable. 
Snow will be added in mountains in most parts of the country the next few days and snow can be unstable to begin with and/or be poorly bonded with older snow.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Winter conditions in all of the country. Snow can be unstable.

weatherForecast.highlights: Lítilsháttar él og sunnanáttir á þriðjudag. Töluverð snjókoma í hægum vindi á miðvikudag. Einhver snjókoma á annesjum á fimmtudag og N eða NA átt. Vægt frost.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Recent wind slabs are expected in most aspects. They might be unstable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Before Christmas, thaw reached mountain tops and when it got cold again, snow got stiff and gained strength. Since then, snow has been added and transported be winds from most directions except for southerly. Continuing snow showers are forecasted, with winds from the north, east and south. Recent wind slabs can therefore be expected in most aspects. They may be poorly bonded with the underlying hardpacked snow.

travelAdvisory.comment:
Avalanche risk has decreased in the North and northern Westfjords after the uncertanty stage was lifted. People should take care when traveling in steep terrain as considerable snow has been added and/or transported in the mountains and snowlayers can be unstable. 
Snow will be added in mountains in most parts of the country the next few days and snow can be unstable to begin with and/or be poorly bonded with older snow.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Winter conditions in all of the country. Snow can be unstable.

weatherForecast.highlights: Éljagangur næstu daga í breytilegum áttum, N-A-S áttum.
